item.title: Hello Manifest
item.description:
Say the legend that a corpulent developer is more experienced. But, how legend is a legend the time is coming to leave the laziness and start to running and make exercises.

The motivations are varied and probably you already know it, but letâ€™s start to write about the developers routine on this fight against sedentary.

Welcome to DevRunning.

Support

We are supported from our friends of DevNaEstrada, a brazilian podcast from developers to developers.
